summary:
On 11/1/12, a sensitive record access log was generated at VA Pittsburgh for routine monitoring and auditing. Two accesses by a VA Clarksburg employee were 
identified as questionable. The access log was provided to the Clarksburg Information Security Officer (ISO) to investigate. At that time, it was determined the VA 
Clarksburg employee inappropriately accessed the Veterans medical record. The Veteran and VA Clarksburg employee are allegedly brothers. On this date, the 
VA Pittsburgh Privacy Officer (PO) was advised of the findings and this incident is being reported for the first time.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
